shortcv.p: Giorgos Zervas holds an MSc in Advanced Computing and a BEng in Computing both from Imperial College (University of London, UK) and an MA in Interactive Multimedia from the London College of Printing (London Institute). Currently he is a PhD candidate at the Department of Management Science and Technology at the Athens University of Economics and Business, Greece pursuing a doctoral thesis on the subject of distributed search engines. His research interests include Information Retrieval, Distributed Computing and Open Source Software. He is the author of the open source Perlfect Search search engine.
